description: Email of the user. Has to be a real active email. Ask user.
name: user_email

collection.label: OMITTED
collection.sentence:
This Privacy Policy outlines our practices regarding the collection, use, and
sharing of personal data.

collection.label: OMITTED
collection.sentence:
DATA COLLECTION AND USE

  

2.1 TYPES OF DATA COLLECTED  

IWe collect personal data necessary to process transactions and provide our
services.

collection.label: OMITTED
collection.sentence:
This may include:

  * User's name and contact information  

  * Payment details such as credit/debit card information  

  * Basic chat information including number of chats per session and general topics
  * Transaction details including amounts, dates, and merchant information  

  * Technical data such as IP addresses, device information, and usage data  

2.2 How we USE YOUR DATA  

The data collected is used solely for the purpose of providing our analytics
and payment services.

description: Name of the GPT user is trying to access to. Do not ask user.
name: product_gpt_name
